title: Bike Saddle Box program lets you demo any saddle on your own bike
content:
Sick of spending hours picking out a saddle that just ends up hurting your back or chafing your bits anyway? Then check out Bike Fit Box’s new Bike Saddle Box feature. The first-of-its-kind program lets you choose a few saddles to try and then sends them to your door for you to test on your […]

The post Bike Saddle Box program lets you demo any saddle on your own bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
